about_the_game:
Become an aircraft mechanic during World War I:

As an aircraft mechanic, your main task is to maintain the efficiency and reliability of the flying machines serviced in the hangar. Repairing and maintaining planes in the chaos of battle is not an easy task, in the game, you will have to face many challenges

Manage, repair and modernize planes:

In war conditions, your actions may have a crucial impact on the course of the mission and the fate of pilots. Therefore, you must always be vigilant, effective, and responsible. There is no time for boredom in the hangar because there are always new challenges and problems to solve.

Develop your hangar:

Your journey as a mechanic is one of constant development. The ability to adapt is crucial when navigating changing plans and unforeseen events. Your knowledge will evolve with your military rank, giving you the respect and recognition you deserve among the Air Force

Realistic military experience:

Feel the pressure and tension of war operations. Develop and cooperate with other mechanics and supply officers, the fate of the sky machines depends on your decisions. Thanks to a promotion system based on authentic military ranks, your contribution will influence the outcome of the conflict.

name: Hangar 1914

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-8600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Become a hangar worker, your task is to repair and maintain aircraft during World War I. The fate of these sky machines and their pilots is in your hands - start your adventure on the front of World War I.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
